title: 3 and Out - Vikings Keep Rollin'; Haskins Disaster; Niners/Pats Trade Reaction; Week 8 Preview; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Vikings Keep Rollin'; Haskins Disaster; Niners/Pats Trade Reaction; Week 8 Preview; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff looks at the Vikings easy TNF win over the Redskins; why Kirk Cousins deserves credit for doing from disaster to dominant, and why he doesn't see Dwayne Haskins succeeding in Washington. He also reacts to the trades from the NFL this week, previews the slate of Week 8 games, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
